channel.title: Changing source
channel.description:
right i started off with project16 v3, its great i liked it, but there isnt much to do other then melee :(
so i decided to get project v.7 ;D
i want to know how i change v.7 to have the following
1. the same rate of exp as v.3
2. no requirment lvls for armour and weps
3. no mage lvls or runes required
4.to change the place you start off and ur stats ( they are 3-2-4 or something, so pure would be out of the question :eek:)
ive already change the commands, added ::barrows etc but i need the requirments sorted out
thanks..if you dont feel you could explain this here, add me on msn o_slice_o@hotmail.co.uk
[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 06:30:17 AM[/size][hr]doesnt anyone know? :(

well you could try learning java

i do know how to atually do those but it would take 2 long to post it
